# White Eagles & Co. - Premium Web Development & Digital Marketing Solutions

> "We build high-performance websites and automate business processes in Slovakia."

## Core Services

- **Web Development**: Custom modern websites using React, PHP, and Python. Specialized in landing pages, corporate portals, and e-shops.
  - URL: https://whiteeagles.sk/service/webdev

- **Advertising Campaigns**: Expert setup and optimization of Google Ads and Meta (Facebook/Instagram) PPC campaigns.
  - URL: https://whiteeagles.sk/service/ads

- **Telegram Bots**: Advanced Python bots for automation, bazo≈° auto-posting, and request management.
  - URL: https://whiteeagles.sk/service/telegram

- **Web Analytics**: Server-side GTM, GA4, Clarity, and conversion tracking setup.
  - URL: https://whiteeagles.sk/service/analytics

- **Bug Fixing**: Technical support, bug fixing, and optimization for WordPress and custom sites.
  - URL: https://whiteeagles.sk/service/bugfix

- **Cookie Consent V2**: GDPR-compliant cookie banners with Google Consent Mode v2 support.
  - URL: https://whiteeagles.sk/service/cookies

## Contact

- **Email**: welcome@whiteeagles.sk
- **Phone**: +421 950 347 163
- **Location**: Bratislava / Stupava, Slovakia
